Package net.tmachine.gpg.hue

Interface Summary
HUD The base type for all HUD implementations; contains the major callbacks needed by the heads-up-editing system.
 

Class Summary
BaseHUD Provides most of the common methods etc for HUD implementations Subclasses should set the "name" variable in their constructor.
ContextManager All input for the viewport is directed to this class, enabling it to keep track of cursor position, current button and keystates, etc.
Demo The automatically-run demo application that loads a few HUDs and lets you draw shapes etc
Document  
HUDList Useful control that allows the user to hide/show any layer and also to activate / de-activate any layer; also displays name and status of all layers, and shows their paint order
HUDManager The main Model and Controller (in MVC terms) for managing the HUDs system.
MainRenderer A very simple main renderer that simply grabs a paint surface on every repaint (managed by Sun's windowing system, "Swing") and gets each visible HUD to paint to that surface in turn.
ShapeCreator A simple HUD that, when active, draws a crosshair and responds to drag / click+move events by drawing a new Rectangle, and when the mouse is released it creates a new rectangle of that size + position and adds it to the base document
ShapeRenderer Very simple renderer that simply renders every shape in the base document using a unique colour for each.
ShapeShifter  
ShapeShifter2 Simple HUD which displays a "your mouse cursor is currently floating over THIS shape" selection-box style thing, and includes a tool which will allow you to drag shapes around the document, even multiple shapes at once (if they overlap and can be dragged in a single gesture).
